PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10032024-09-09PS
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Authorizations to Carry Restricted Firearms and Certain Hand-¬Åguns Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the AUTHORIZATIONS TO CARRY RESTRICTED FIREARMS AND CERTAIN HANDGUNS in order to transfer from Chief Firearms Officers to the Commissioner of Firearms the decision-making authority for the issuance, revocation, and renewal of protection of the life Authorizations to Carry for individuals for restricted firearms or prohibited handguns, as well as for attaching conditions to these authorizations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0176 Publication Date: 2024-09-25
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the AUTHORIZATIONS TO CARRY RESTRICTED FIREARMS AND CERTAIN HANDGUNS in order to transfer from Chief Firearms Officers to the Commissioner of Firearms the decision-making authority for the issuance, revocation, and renewal of protection of the life Authorizations to Carry for individuals for restricted firearms or prohibited handguns, as well as for attaching conditions to these authorizations.
